org.globus.opensaml11.md.common
Class NameMapper

java.lang.Object
  org.globus.opensaml11.md.common.NameMapper

public class NameMapper
extends Object

Facility for managing mappings from SAML Name Identifiers to local LocalPrincipalobjects. Mappings are registered by Name Identifier format and can be associated with a String id and recovered based on the same.

Author:
Walter Hoehn
See Also:
NameIdentifierMapping

protected  SharedMemoryShibHandle defaultMapping
          Mapping to use if no other mappings have been added

Method Detail

initialize

protected void initialize()

addNameMapping

public void addNameMapping(Element e)
                    throws NameIdentifierMappingException
Constructs a NameIdentifierMappingbased on XML configuration data and adds it to this NameMapper, registering it according to its format.

Parameters:
e - An XML representation of a NameIdentifierMapping
Throws:
NameIdentifierMappingException - If the mapping could not be constructed according to the supplied configuration

addNameMapping

public void addNameMapping(NameIdentifierMapping mapping)
Adds a NameIdentifierMappingto this name mapper, registering it according to its format.

Parameters:
mapping - the mapping to add

getNameIdentifierMapping

public NameIdentifierMapping getNameIdentifierMapping(URI format)
Returns the NameIdentifierMappingregistered for a given format.

Parameters:
format - the registered format
Returns:
the mapping or null if no mapping is registered for the given format

getNameIdentifierMappingById

public NameIdentifierMapping getNameIdentifierMappingById(String id)
Returns the NameIdentifierMapping registered for a given id

Parameters:
id - the registered id
Returns:
the mapping or null if no mapping is registered for the given id

protected NameIdentifierMapping loadNameIdentifierMapping(Class implementation,
                                                          Element config)
                                                   throws NameIdentifierMappingException
Throws:
NameIdentifierMappingException

getPrincipal

public Principal getPrincipal(SAMLNameIdentifier nameId,
                              ServiceProvider sProv,
                              IdentityProvider idProv)
                       throws NameIdentifierMappingException,
                              InvalidNameIdentifierException
Maps a SAML Name Identifier to a local principal using the appropriate registered mapping.

Parameters:
nameId - the SAML Name Identifier that should be converted
sProv - the provider initiating the request
idProv - the provider handling the request
Returns:
the local principal
Throws:
NameIdentifierMappingException - If the NameMapperencounters an internal error
InvalidNameIdentifierException - If the SAMLNameIdentifiercontains invalid data

getNameIdentifier

public SAMLNameIdentifier getNameIdentifier(String id,
                                            LocalPrincipal principal,
                                            ServiceProvider sProv,
                                            IdentityProvider idProv)
                                     throws NameIdentifierMappingException
Maps a local principal to a SAML Name Identifier using the mapping registered under a given id.

Parameters:
id - the id under which the effective NameIdentifierMapping is registered
principal - the principal to map
sProv - the provider initiating the request
idProv - the provider handling the request
Returns:
the name identifier that maps to the given principal
Throws:
NameIdentifierMappingException - If the NameMapper encounters an internal error

destroy

public void destroy()
Cleanup resources that won't be released when this object is garbage-collected
